name: Anaconda Simulator
description:
From the jungles of the Amazon comes one of the most feared creatures on the planet - the Anaconda. This guy is looking for his next meal. But you can be sure, it wont be you. This game puts you in control of this deadly beast.

Rise from the water and look for your next snack.

Includes 3 action packed maps and 24 missions to complete.

Your snake will grow larger the most points you score. Come and see just how big you can make him grow.
